column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I went out to ride my bicycle one morning , only to find that my front tire was very flat .
#text=I grabbed my manual air pump and tried to put air into it , but it would not hold any and kept going flat .
#text=I heard a hissing sound , so I knew I had punctured the tire somehow .
#text=Luckily I had a spare inner tube that I could put on .
#text=I flipped my bicycle over and took a wrench to remove the tire from the spokes .
#text=It was kind of greasy and messy , but I did n't mind .
#text=I was able to get it off pretty easily .
#text=I then pushed the tire off of the rim all the way around .
#text=When the tire was off the rim , I took the spare tube I had and put it all around the inside of the tire .
#text=I then pushed the tire back onto the rim .
#text=It did not go on as easily as it came off , and it took a bit of struggling with the tire to get it back on .
#text=I took my manual air pump and pumped up the tube inside of the tire .
#text=It held air very nicely , and I did n't hear any hissing and it did not go flat .
#text=I then put the tire back on the front bicycle fork , and tightened the nuts so it would hold very well and not slip or come off .
#text=I then flipped my bicycle over and made sure the tire was still holding air .
#text=It was , so I put on my helmet , and finally was able to enjoy my morning bike ride .
